testcase name: Verify Username field is visible and enabled
description: This test case verifies that the Username text field is visible and enabled on the login page.
preconditions: User is on the login page.
test steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Check if the Username text field is visible.
3. Check if the Username text field is enabled.
expected results: The Username text field should be visible and enabled.

testcase name: Verify error message for empty Username
description: This test case verifies that an error message is displayed when the Username field is left empty.
preconditions: User is on the login page.
test steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Click on the Username text field.
3. Click on the Password text field to move focus away.
expected results: An error message 'Username is required' should be visible.

testcase name: Verify Password field is visible and enabled
description: This test case verifies that the Password text field is visible and enabled on the login page.
preconditions: User is on the login page.
test steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Check if the Password text field is visible.
3. Check if the Password text field is enabled.
expected results: The Password text field should be visible and enabled.

testcase name: Verify error message for empty Password
description: This test case verifies that an error message is displayed when the Password field is left empty.
preconditions: User is on the login page.
test steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Click on the Password text field.
3. Click on the Username text field to move focus away.
expected results: An error message 'Password is required' should be visible.

description: This test case verifies that the password can be made visible by clicking the 'show' icon.
preconditions: User is on the login page.
test steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Click the 'show password' icon.

description: This test case verifies that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials and then log out.
preconditions: User is on the login page and has valid credentials.
test steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid username and password.
3. Click the login button.
4. Verify that the user is redirected to the home page.
5. Verify the logged-in username.
6. Click the logout button.
7. Verify that the user is redirected to the login page.
expected results: User should be logged in successfully, and then logged out successfully.
